name: cfpybmkconv
short_description: Bookmarks converter. Has command line interface and a GUI (Tk). Can convert ".url" into ".desktop". Written in Python. Formats: .desktop, .url, .webloc [read], Firefox (.html), Firefox 3 (.json) [read], Konqueror (.xml), Opera (.adr)
